website_summaries.verdict: This mascara won't work for everyone, but provides the dual benefits of nourishing and lengthening the lashes of those who can use it.
pros: Great for mascara enthusiasts with short lashes, as it's formulated to make them appear much longer
Contains nourishing olive oil and vitamin E that may actually strengthen lashes, and promote growth
cons: Product starts to dry out somewhat quickly, then becomes clumpy to apply
Some users with sensitive eyes report irritation after using it

customer_reviews.title: Flakes into eyes
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this as being a "healthier" mascara. And I love how it goes on, its not too thick or clumpy, it provides a more natural look. But this stuff, when it dries, will flake off into tiny little pieces into your eyeballs. If your eyeballs are anything like my eyeballs, they will complain about these tiniest of flakes until you can grab a flashlight and a magnified mirror and spend ten minute trying to track down the smallest of black specks amongst your watery, blood shot eyes. Why. Why.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara Ever
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are extremely sensitive and this is the first mascara I have ever used that doesn't make my eyes water or burn. It doesn't clump, which is really great for people who are under-blessed in the lash department. With other mascaras, I have ended up with what appeared to be 5 giant eyelashes. Now I have a much more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: The Best Mascara for sensitive Eyes
customer_reviews.text: My regular mascara had started irritating my eyes causing burning and redness, even purchased a new mascara, still irritating, so I decided to try healthy lengths mascara, the best decision ever, my eyes don't hurt anymore, and the mascara itself is great, I have thin, blond lashes and this makes them full and lovely,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long looking lashes! Good for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara because it’s supposed to be good for people with sensitive skin. First and foremost, this mascara is awesome for long looking lashes! One of the best I’ve ever tried. Secondly, I’ve been using it for about a week and haven’t had any skin reaction or irritation from it after taking it off. Great mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for the right mascara
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product. It smears too easily. Bright side, I am happy that it does not irritate my eyes even when I wear contacts. Unfortunately, it works best when worn for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Angles

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara! No more raccoon eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara! It makes my eyelashes look so much longer without clumping at all! I love that it stays in place and I don't end up with raccoon eyes! So many of the high end expensive mascaras that I have tried end up all over my brow bone as the day goes on. I've been impressed with Neutrogena mascaras! It doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes either. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Savada

customer_reviews.title: Dried out too fast
customer_reviews.text: This review is for my wife. She is looking for a hypoallergenic mascara and thought she would give this well-rated and affordable one a try. She found it hard to build, but liked it once she was finished applying it. It worked okay for about two or three weeks, and then it went dry. She said she was okay with it not building up dramatically, but getting dry after only a few weeks is not acceptable. She might as well buy a $20 mascara, since those last her 4-5 months.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural look
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and how it goes on to my lashes and how it makes them look naturally long. At first the mascara seemed to be dried up. But I swirled the wand in the tube several times and the wand was able to get coated enough in order to deposit enough mascara on to my lashes. Washes off very easily. I recommend this to others and I will be purchasing it again
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE ANN STEELE

customer_reviews.title: Dried up. Don’t bother with this one
customer_reviews.text: I received this neutrogena healthy lengths mascara sealed in original packaging. It has a cap on it which is to be removed and the brush inserted. It took so many times pushing the brush in and out to even coat it. The mascara is so dried out it’s nearly unusable. You can see in the pic I posted how the brush is so clumped up with dry mascara and it’s brand new!!! I was promptly refunded on this item which I appreciate. Amazon is amazing. This product is not.
customer_reviews.author: big red

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: I have never disliked a mascara as much as this I bought. Dried up, perhaps old.. I added saline solution to enable usage. Doesn't grab lash, doesn't lengthen. Useless - I regrettably tossed out after 2 tries.
customer_reviews.author: Sofie 1219

customer_reviews.title: RACCOON EYES AFTER 1 HOUR AT DESK
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Blinc mascara for years, ever since Neutrogena discontinued their Lash Tint. But periodically I search for something new [i.e., less expensive]. Found this and thought I'd try it... Went on nicely - had to brush it on quite a bit to get it showing up well [it didn't clump, no spider lashes here], but they looked good. Got on a call for an hour, and afterwards - major raccoon eyes already! Underneath and on the lid! Sigh. Will be ordering Blinc again...it's a bit pricey but it's the only mascara that doesn't give me raccoon eyes.
customer_reviews.author: J. JesseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Expired Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara and have purchased many times, however, what I received is a dried out, expired clumpy mess. Took unreasonably long to arrive to add insult to injury. Skip this seller!
customer_reviews.author: T.ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara and very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Today was first day using. No smudges on upper eye lid like my usual dilemma and it's been on for 10 hrs. The brush is a learning curve for me cuz Its fuller than the last brush I used which was very thin and rather stiff.. everytime I switch products I do have to get used to the brush! It was very windy today and usually my eyes will water and then burn but i didn't have this problem today.. works well for sensitive eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: 100% reccomend
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!! I've used it for only a week and my lashes already feel so much better. I've used the better than sex mascara and the L'Oreal lash paradise, and both hurt my eyes, this works so well and I feel no irritation. Lashes look longer and healthier even when the mascara is off. Totally reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: dafuz

customer_reviews.title: This mascara seems dry and wonder if it is old ...
customer_reviews.text: This mascara seems dry and wonder if it is old as there is very little mascara o the brush. Also I've experience watery eyes whenever I wear the mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Turner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: So amazing for such a great price! I seriously cannot believe this mascara is so cheap. It’s amazing. I switched from Tarte’s Tarteist lash paint because I just couldn’t justify the price, and I’m so glad I did. I do wish I got a little more volume, but the length makes up for it big time.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Good Drug Store Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I usually like to purchase only natural/organic type mascaras without all the junk in it. With that being said, this Neutrogena mascara works very well for a non-organic one. It doesn't irritate my eyes, nor does it smudge or flake (I only wear mascara on my top lashes, as I'm a mature lady and this looks best on me). It really lengthens and thickens my lashes so I don't even have to curl them. I like to keep Neutrogena as a back up in case of running out of my organic mascara. Gave it four stars though because it still contains some junk ingredients! Would be nice if Neutrogena "cleaned up" this mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Aquamarine

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! It doesn’t flake or smudge and my teeny tiny lashes have doubled, nearly tripled in length. Even without the mascara! It looks like I’m wearing false lashes. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: QueenofthehouseTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting, high definition and volume of lashes
customer_reviews.text: My eyes frequently water. I HAD been using regular mascara and it was always running. THIS mascara is different. The brush takes and coats each lash for volume and definition... and for coverage that won't smear because of rain or teary eyes. I rub my eyes with vaseline and then take a warm cloth over my eyes to remove the vaseline, which thereby removes the mascara. Amazing product for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: very dry
customer_reviews.text: I like that a cap comes with it so that the brush can be left out so as not to continually contaminate the product.. I'm finding it very dry or lacking product. The price was right, but I can not buy it again. Very sorry. I love Neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mowrey BMTop Contributor: Karaoke

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of mascara...until now!
customer_reviews.text: I wear minimal makeup. I usually try to avoid mascara because I've never had good luck with it. The ones I've used before are chunky and flake everywhere. A friend recommended this to me and I was surprised by the results. It lasts all day, isn't noticeably goopy, and didn't get irritate my eyes. Plus it won't break the bank. It does what I like my make up to do: accentuate natural beauty. I highly recommend this for people with sensitive eye and minimalist makeup routines.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I've used better lengthening mascaraa
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I've been using bare minerals and Tarte mascara, but I wanted something a little more natural looking but also added length to my stingy lashes. This stuff advertises extreme lengthening. Haha..yeah right. The types I was using previously added more length then this and length wasn't even their selling points. Glad it wasn't expensive. One good point, it darkens lashes just a little so they do look natural. Just not enough length.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Prater

customer_reviews.title: No clumps and applies smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It is buildable without becoming clumpy, and it feels really smooth and gentle on my lashes. Other brands can go on rough and feel dry but this is not like that at all. I wear contact lenses and this does not flake or irritate my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Eyes
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are sensitive in general and I have allergies but over the past few months they have become even more sensitive, I've had to keep switching mascaras due to them causing my eyes to become itchy later on. I've had no issues with this mascara, I go over my lashes twice and get a nice amount of volume with no clumping. I definitely would recommend it if you are having more sensitivity with mascaras.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not good for very sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are very easily irrated so when I found this online I thought it's worth a shot. The color and coverage were great but my eyes still were very itchy and irrated by the end of the day and it would not clean completely off even after using clique brand "take off the day' and that stuff gets off the most stubborn red lip stains
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where this was stored prior to shipping but it was disgusting. It was clumpy and unusable. Didn’t want to hustle with return so I bought it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight formula, no clumps, great length.
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than my Benefit- Theyre Real! mascara. i wear loads of eye makeup every day and this formula is super light weight and lengthens better than most. no clumps, and they feel like my own lashes. i use this as a base coat, but it makes my doubled up mascara last longer, feel better, and look much better. Additionally, I have trouble finding mascara that *actually* lengthens. this stuff is honestly pretty good especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: SLOPPY LIKE WETNESS, WON'T STAY ON LASHES---
customer_reviews.text: NOT GOOD, IT WAS SO SLOPPY WET, SEEMED LIKE IT HAD EXTRA WATER??? DEFINTELY IS NOT SMUDGE PROOF OR OTHERWISE AND DOES NOT STAY ON LASHES. I SHOULD HAVE TOLD THEM BUT IT TOOK SO LONG TO GET IT THAT RETURNING SEEMED MORE OF AN ISSUE AS GETTING IT. MY LOSS BUT WON'T BUY FROM THEM AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Dried up and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: While this mascara is excellent, the product from this seller was dried out upon opening and it’s now too late to return. I will never buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: D & T

customer_reviews.title: No more eye irritation
customer_reviews.text: In the last couple years my eyes have been super sensitive to eye make up and this solved my problem. No more constant eyes watering. I like thicker lashes and this does not do that but it is slightly buildable. I am just glad to have found a mascara that does not irritate my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Ilovebling

customer_reviews.title: Nice applicator wand.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I like the brush that separates the lashes and makes them look “feathery”. Product runs out in about 2-3 months of use of 3-4 times weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not good here
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this product from Amazon. I returned the first package because it made my eyes burn all day long, even though it's hypo-allergenic. They kindly replaced the item with the same mascara, and it's doing the same thing. I don't know if it's out of date mascara or dry crappy stuff. But it's awful and I wouldn't waste your money buying it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KGB

customer_reviews.title: not the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is just not on point. First of all, its not Black Brown, its just black. The brush is very strange and not convenient to use. The consistency of the mascara is not so good. It crumbles after drying, I get these black "breadcrumbs" under my eyes after several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Makes lashes look longer and no clumping.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mascara, when I put it on my lashes do not clump and they look like they have grown. It also comes off easily. I am 69 and I have tried many, many brands, this is the one and priced perfectly. A winner in every way. Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Branam

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much clumping this mascara has. I only use 1 layer, so it was unexpected. I use mostly Neutrogena products and have always been happy with it. But between clumping and the unnatural look. I wound not recommend this and if I could return it for my money back, i absolutely would.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Poloskov

customer_reviews.title: I like this eyeliner, why you ask...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to make fine lines. It doesn’t make my eyes itch or burn. Nice black even color. Decent price (approx $4 ) Holds up well in the rain. Comes off easy with soap and water (or with lotion on a q-tip) Cons: None.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: I change mascara every 2-3 weeks---this smelled awful within 5 days so I tossed it..again
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this mascara often. Due to sensitive eyes, I only use it a few times a week and this worked fine. I use a new tube every 2-3 weeks. The last couple of tubes have developed an odor so I toss them right away. Not sure what is going on but I will not be using this product again. Bummer!!!
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good product with good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara I use. Neutrogena has good products at a good price. It's super good for sensitive skin. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive and dry eyes. I have not worn eye makeup in years because it aggravates my eyes so much but I read about Neutrogena Healthy Lengths and thought I would give it a try. I really missed wearing makeup and now, thanks to Neutrogena I can wear mascara again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Malicoat

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic!
customer_reviews.text: Does not go on heavy and clumpy like most mascara and gives beautiful length to my lashes! I love that it is hypoallergenic which is all that I can use! I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: emtee433

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Thought neutorgena mascara would be a good purchase. WRONG! The mascara comes out on the brush in globs. Cannot get off brush without making a mess. Is so thick, it cannot be applied to eyelashes. I ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Toge

customer_reviews.title: Great product for natural lashes.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite for building natural lashes. Doesn't build up, feels nice. It is not water proof. I have bought two so far. Doesn't last long but definitely worth the cost. I love this mascara and brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive eyes approved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have sensitive eyes and most mascaras hurt my eyelids. This is an amazing mascara. Good coverage and I hardly notice I’m even wearing mascara like I have with others I’ve used. If you have sensitive eyes this is a great go to!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ostheimer

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara it says Healthy Lengths and it does make your eyelashes long and full looking. I wear contacts and have not had any problem with the mascara falling in my eyes, it is also hypoallergenic.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: I like it pretty well, I've been using it for about 2 months pretty regularly. No damage or breakage to speak of and it doesnt make my lashes clump as long as I don't apply too much. Overall a good investment, it's hard to tell if it's actually "helped" my lashes grow stronger and I doubt it has, but it works for me. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Claucherty

customer_reviews.title: hypoalergenic
customer_reviews.text: Before this brand I used various eye liner my eyes were tearing daily. Took me long time to realize I need to change my make-up. Since I am using this mascara, no tearing, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes and have a hard time finding a mascara that does not bother my eyes. A great affordable find
customer_reviews.author: scooby

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: New favorite mascara! A little goes a long way especially for someone that likes a natural look. Can cake it on for more drama look if that's what you're into.
customer_reviews.author: eyesclosed

customer_reviews.title: Good for people with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are very itchy and watery from allergies. This mascara does not irritate them. It doesn't go on thick like I wanted, but I use a waterproof mascara as a finishing coat.
customer_reviews.author: atyk2018

customer_reviews.title: Full Lashes with Easy Removal
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping and love the product! Easily removes, and does a good job of separating lashes and making them appear fuller. Not a lot of product, however, it is priced well so good value. And, it doesn’t bother my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Crocodile

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this mascara. I hate the new trend of huge, spider leg lashes. This enhances and lengthens your natural lash, which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: b2thaZ

customer_reviews.title: Supposedly for sensitive eyes/skin, but it made me itch ...
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly for sensitive eyes/skin, but it made me itch immediately after applying. Additionally, flaked off very soon after applying.
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: First time my eyes didnt water the minute I put on mascara. Unfortunately, they didnt send waterproof as I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Burns my eyes
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is easy to remove but still made my sensitive eyes burn. I don't notice a huge change in length or thickness of my lashes either.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This masacara goes on easily, doesn’t clump or leave a smudge under the eye, and is easy to remove. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KayLynMac

customer_reviews.title: My eyelashes are better than before I used this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I swear my eyelashes are longer and darker even when I’m not using this product?! Super nourishing and light, no smudging, the perfect mascara. NOT waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Healthy Lengths Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does extend the lashes perfect I enjoy it. Yes I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SurvivorPAA

customer_reviews.title: Thick and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: I tried to thin it out, but it must be very old and still is clumpy and hard to apply.
customer_reviews.author: ESR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make sensitive eyes water!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the only mascaras tried that doesn't make sensitive eyes water!
customer_reviews.author: mikedqt2

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara...
customer_reviews.text: Nice mascara...pretty average. I have sensitive eyes and have had no problems on that front. Provides definition, but not much on volume or length.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Naturally
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like super goopy mascara so this slightly “drier” feel is good for me. Goes on very lightly and looks natural. Not a volume product
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Not really great as a lengthening mascara
customer_reviews.text: Good for sensitive eyes but I am disappointed that it is not really a lengthening product.
customer_reviews.author: RaffyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for every day makeup! I was looking for something soft and easy to use for just a little bit of oomph and this does that and more. It's also not an irritant to my eyes, which most mascaras are.
customer_reviews.author: Sky H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value not true quantity
customer_reviews.text: Great results on lengthening and I have sparse short lashes! No clumping either, but disappointed in the quantity in the bottle itself! Definitely NOT full
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mazet

customer_reviews.title: No Allergic Reactoin!
customer_reviews.text: So great to not have an allergic reaction to a mascara. It does a great job on volume without a lot of clumping.
customer_reviews.author: SassyWnch

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 favorite mascara for sultry eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is my favorite. It creates well defined, clump-free, sweeping lashes. Make sure to wiggle side to side, starting at the base of your lashes for best effect. I hope they never change the brush or formula!
customer_reviews.author: Des Tucker

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Old product. Arrived and within immediate use I was able to determine that it was DRIED OUT. Wast of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Money
customer_reviews.text: Did not lengthen or thicken, and the tube is much smaller than most competitors = hardly any product in tube. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Non-Irritating
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mascara. The only one that does not irritate my eyes. Have been unable to find HypoA mascara in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: JBMMS

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive eues
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive eyes and regular mascara makes my eyes bloodshot. Tried this and my problems went away! Really is better formula than others
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because my eyes are very sensitive and it was fine to wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Chzy

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mascara! Great color, goes on smooth, except I definitely need two coats.
customer_reviews.author: sunni

customer_reviews.title: For sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Goes on smoothly. Didn't last all day but long enough. I have sensitive eyes and after wearing a few hours it did cause a small amount of burning itching. Still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Product not stores properly; dried out
customer_reviews.text: Old product - dried out. Buy it at your local drugstore instead.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, doesn't smear around my eyes, and doesn't irritate my allergic eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Siu Yung Chiu

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a person with sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: easy to use has staying power and looks great !!
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! Its the perfect liquidity for applying and doesn't smudge for daily wear! I have psoriasis and this mascara doesn't bother my sensitive skin at all! I mean all skin is different but this is one of the first mascaras that's actually not been annoying. It will leak if you get it wet but that's kinda the point seeing as it's healthy and isn't supposed to stay on for all eternity. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gebhard

customer_reviews.title: Not very lengthening.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes off easily but it goes on very thin.
customer_reviews.author: MIAinSDC

customer_reviews.title: Dries out in tube quickly,  not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very short life. Dries up very quickly after first use.
customer_reviews.author: llindalu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful non-irritating mascara
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and remove. Good color without extra chips or "hairs" falling off into my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: MT Geri

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lashes healthier.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Makes my eyelashes grow and they are healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Dried-out mascara
customer_reviews.text: The mascara was dried out and clumps heavily. I've bought fresher packets (in drugstores) before that did not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product.
customer_reviews.text: Product was dry when received. Has not improved. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Keil

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I looooove this... True to its name.. It really did help my lashes to be healthy.
customer_reviews.author: AsRa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First mascara that I have found that does not bother my eyes
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I only use neutrogena because it doesn’t clump and it stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth to apply
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara and will continue to order it at lest a few more times. I doesn't clump when applying, however the downfall to that is I seem to be going through it very quickly. It's not a big tube so think I'll actually see how long it really does last with the next tube I open.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product! Especially
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Especially, I am contact lens wearer and other mascara's were effecting my eyes, this one is really good.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this product if you have sensitive eyes. It’s irritated my eyes so bad that I finally had to take it off. I will never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes of using this mascara, my eyes were burning, red, and streaming tears. I have never had a reaction to mascara before, but tried this because my eyes were a little irritated. Never again! Gave it one star because it wouldn’t allow 0.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Ovendale

customer_reviews.title: Long and thick lashes
customer_reviews.text: It’s been quite a while since I used makeup but this does the trick nicely. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry kerwin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product did not hold up. After a couple of hours it was like I had not applied mascara. I use other Neutrogena products and very happy with them, so I was very disappointed with the mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Love and my eyes don't itch anymore
customer_reviews.text: I was using maybelline and had for years until my eyes started itching so I bought a new one. Well they still itched. Did research for mascara for itchy eyes and so far with this brand my eyes don't itch.
customer_reviews.author: melinda fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Good and light
customer_reviews.text: Very natural for everyday where not enough impact for a dressy event I will buy again for work
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt cake up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Doesn't cake up. Doesnt bother my eyes and I have sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for long lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally long/thin lashes and this mascara works great for them! I have found that many mascaras clump my lashes together, but that has not been the case with this particular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it dont irritate my eyes at all I will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: sarah serrano

customer_reviews.title: How old is this mascara?
customer_reviews.text: The first tube I ordered was ok but the brush was bad. The second one the brush has been beaten down and in clumps from the first time I took it out of the tube. The formula is also very dry. These two don’t mix. I didn’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria LeMonnier

customer_reviews.title: For low end mascara it is wonderful! I usually Love Lancôme but this is great ...
customer_reviews.text: For low end mascara it is wonderful! I usually Love Lancôme but this is great for the price. I find it starts to smell a bit and I need to get a new one after about 1.5-2 months. Washes off really well. Bought one for my mom as well!
customer_reviews.author: georgia

customer_reviews.title: Not the best mascara
customer_reviews.text: Not the best mascara. Doesn’t come off that well. Isn’t that dark either.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Snyder

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Healthy Lengths Mascara for Stronger, Longer Lashes, Clump-, Smudge- and Flake-Free Mascara with Olive Oil, Vitamin E and Rice Protein, Black 02,.21 oz
product_meta.description:
Color:02 / BlackHelp grow your lashes to their fullest potential with Neutrogena Healthy Lengths Mascara. This lash-lengthening mascara leaves your lashes noticeably longer without clumps, flakes, or smudges. The soft-bristle brush combs through every lash from root to tip, smoothly applying antioxidant-rich color for outstanding definition and intensity. During consumer testing, this formula with rice protein was shown to extend lashes to twice their length for lashes that look up to 100% longer, beautifully healthy and noticeable. Vitamin E and olive oil deeply nourish and strengthen lashes from the inside out, so they stay strong day after day. This dermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested mascara is safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. Easily remove the mascara with Neutrogena Oil-Free Makeup Remover or soap and water.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena Cosmetics
feature_bullets: .21-ounce tube of Neutrogena Healthy Lengths Lash-Lengthening and Strengthening Mascara to help grow your lashes to their fullest potential
Formulated with antioxidant vitamin E, rice protein, and olive oil, this mascara nourishes and strengthens for lashes that look up to 100% longer with a formula that won't clump, smudge, or flake

On the outside, the soft-bristle brush combs through every lash from root to tip, smoothly applying antioxidant-rich color for outstanding definition and intensity while the formula of this eye makeup helps extend and strengthen lashes from inside
This dermatologist- & ophthalmologist-tested brand is safe and gentle for people with sensitive eyes & contact lens wearers for use in part of a regular makeup routine
Easily remove this lash-lengthening mascara with the Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover or soap & water

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
